snippet: The Museum of Modern Art’s new exhibition of 20th-century photography from the Walther Collection is enhanced by information tools that give it scope and depth.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews exhibition Modern Photographs: The Thomas Walther Collection, 1909-1949 at Museum of Modern Art.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of Modern Art’s new exhibition of 20th-century photography from the Walther Collection is enhanced by information tools that give it scope and depth.

headline.print_headline: Black and White and Accessible All Over
headline.seo: MoMA Gives Walther Photo Collection Multiple Platforms
headline.main: Black and White and Accessible All Over
